Error Codes.errorMeaning: Activation of protection device (high pressure cut)
Error Codes.possibleSolution: Activation of PSH, locked motor, abnormal operation in the power supply phase

Error Codes.errorMeaning: Communication Transmission Alarm (Not outdoor unit detected)
Error Codes.possibleSolution: Loose, disconnected, broken or short-circuited connector

Error Codes.errorMeaning: Lost communication with all slave YUTAKI Units
Error Codes.possibleSolution: Loose, disconnected, broken or short-circuited connector

Error Codes.errorMeaning: Abnormal transmission between inverter PCB and RASC unit PCB
Error Codes.possibleSolution: Transmission failure between inverter PCBs. (Loose Connector, Wire Breaking, Blowout of Fuse)

Error Codes.errorMeaning: Reception of abnormal operation code for detection of power source phase
Error Codes.possibleSolution: Power source with abnormal wave pattern. Main power supply phase is reversely connected or one phase is not connected

Error Codes.errorMeaning: Excessively low voltage or excessively high voltage for the inverter
Error Codes.possibleSolution: Voltage drop in power supply. Incorrect wiring or insufficient capacity of power supply wiring
Excessive Refrigerant Charge, Failure of Thermistor, Incorrect Wiring, Incorrect Piping Connection, Expansion Valve Locking at Opened Position (Disconnected Connector)

Error Codes.errorMeaning: Excessively high discharge gas temperature at the top of compressor
Error Codes.possibleSolution: Insufficient refrigerant charge, refrigerant leakage. Expansion valve closed or clogged
Loose, disconnected, broken or short-circuited connector
Loose, disconnected, broken or short-circuited connector

Error Codes.errorMeaning: Indoor Liquid Pipe Temp Thermistor Abnormality (THMl)
Error Codes.possibleSolution: Loose, disconnected, broken or short-circuited connector

Error Codes.errorMeaning: Indoor Gas Pipe Temperature Thermistor Abnormality (THMg)
Error Codes.possibleSolution: Loose, disconnected, broken or short-circuited connector
Loose, disconnected, broken or short-circuited connector
Loose, disconnected, broken or short-circuited connector
Loose, disconnected, broken or short-circuited connector
Loose, disconnected, broken or short-circuited connector

Error Codes.errorMeaning: Water Plate HEX pipe thermistor abnormally (THMwohp)
Error Codes.possibleSolution: Loose, disconnected, broken or short-circuited connector
Loose, disconnected, broken or short-circuited connector
Incorrect wiring, disconnected wiring, broken cable, short circuit

Error Codes.errorMeaning: Module X is in alarm state
Error Codes.possibleSolution: Sub unit alarm
Loose, disconnected, broken or short-circuited connector
Loose, disconnected, broken or short-circuited connector

Error Codes.errorMeaning: Incorrect capacity setting or combined capacity between outdoor and indoor units
Error Codes.possibleSolution: Incorrect Capacity Code Setting, Excessive or Insufficient Indoor Unit Total Capacity Code
Duplication of indoor unit number, number of indoor units over specifications
Current LCD configuration does not allow proper operation

Error Codes.errorMeaning: Activation of the safety device from excessively high discharge pressure
Error Codes.possibleSolution: Overload (obstruction of HEX, short circuit) mixture of inert gas, Excessive Refrigerant

Error Codes.errorMeaning: Activation of the safety device from excessively low suction pressure (protection from vacuum operation)
Error Codes.possibleSolution: Shortage or leakage of refrigerant, piping clogging, expansion valve close-locked, fan motor locked
Overload, overcurrent. Failure of Inverter PCB, heat exchanger clogged, locked compressor. EVI/EVO failure

Error Codes.errorMeaning: Abnormal operation of the current sensor
Error Codes.possibleSolution: Incorrect wiring of current sensor. Failure of control PCB or Inverter PCB
Inverter module (IPM, DIP-IPM) and Inverter PCB abnormality. Failure of compressor, clogging of heat exchanger
Heat Exchanger Clogging. Fan Motor Failure
Failure of DIP-IPM, IPM or Inverter PCB

Error Codes.errorMeaning: Activating the protection of the fan motor
All slave units are in alarm state or there is no communication
Error Codes.possibleSolution: Slave unit alarm
Loose, disconnected, broken or short-circuited connector
Loose, disconnected, broken or short-circuited connector

Error Codes.errorMeaning: Transmission error between Central and indoor communication
Error Codes.possibleSolution: Indoor fuse meltdown, Indoor/central connection wiring (breaking, wiring error, etc.)

Error Codes.errorMeaning: Hydraulic alarm flow & Water Pump malfunction
Error Codes.possibleSolution: Water flow is not detected in the hydraulic cycle or Pump defective
High temperature is detected in Electric Heater

Error Codes.errorMeaning: Mixing over-temperature limit protection for Mixed circuit
Error Codes.possibleSolution: Circuit 2 supply temperature > Target temperature + offset
Two > Tmax +5K

Error Codes.errorMeaning: Freeze Protection by Cold water inlet, outlet temperature detection
Freeze Protection Stop by indoor liquid temperature thermistor

Error Codes.possibleSolution: No Opentherm/Hlink communication for a continuous period of 10 minutes
There is no communication for 1 hour with one or two RF receivers which are bound to the RF-Bridge
There is no concordance between indoor outdoor unit capacity
No H-link communication for a continuous period of 1 minute between Indoor and LCD User control by connection wiring (breaking, wiring error, etc.)

Error Codes.errorMeaning: Momentary Power interruption or Low voltage detected

Error Codes.possibleSolution: Compressor failure. This alarm code appears when alarms 02, 07, 08, 45, 47 occur three times within 6 hours.

Error Codes.errorMeaning: Activation of protection control for excessively high pressure
Error Codes.possibleSolution: Stop after P12 retry due to discharge pressure Pd ≥ 2.78 MPa continued for 10 seconds.
Stop after P06 retry due to Ps ≤ 0.15 MPa continued for 90 seconds.
Immediate stop with Ps ≤ 0.1 MPa.
Stop after P11 retry due to pressure ratio ε < 1.8 continued for 3 minutes.
Td ≥ 120 ºC continued for 10 minutes, Td ≥ 140 ºC continued for 5 seconds.

Error Codes.errorMeaning: Failure of discharge gas pressure sensor
Error Codes.possibleSolution: Loose, disconnected, broken or short-circuited connector.

Error Codes.errorMeaning: Failure of suction gas pressure sensor
Error Codes.possibleSolution: Loose, disconnected, broken or short-circuited connector.

Error Codes.errorMeaning: Transmission error between Inverter PCB and Main PCB
Error Codes.possibleSolution: Described in inverter abnormal stop control.
Reverse/Open Phase.
Wrong DSW setting in the case of Co041.

Error Codes.errorMeaning: Excessively low voltage or excessively high voltage for the inverter
Error Codes.possibleSolution: Described in inverter abnormal stop control.

Error Codes.errorMeaning: Abnormal operation of the current sensor
Error Codes.possibleSolution: Described in inverter abnormal stop control.

Error Codes.errorMeaning: Activation of protection for inverter instantaneous over current
Error Codes.possibleSolution: Described in inverter abnormal stop control.
Described in inverter abnormal stop control.

Error Codes.errorMeaning: Increase in the inverter fin temperature or abnormality
Error Codes.possibleSolution: Described in inverter abnormal stop control.
Described in inverter abnormal stop control.
Described in inverter abnormal stop control.
No setting of unit capacity or incorrect setting of unit capacity

Error Codes.errorMeaning: Incorrect setting address or refrigerant cycle
Error Codes.possibleSolution: Over 64 indoor units setting by number or indoor unit address

Error Codes.errorMeaning: Incorrect setting of indoor unit number for H-LINK type
Error Codes.possibleSolution: The number of indoor units connected to the H-LINK II of one system is 17 or higher

Error Codes.errorMeaning: Slave PC-ARFH1E stops answering to Master PC-ARFH1E
Error Codes.possibleSolution: Loose, disconnected, broken or short-circuited connector
